attributes.action: Stop Kraft from completing a hostile takeover of the UK firm Unilever
attributes.additional_details: Look at what Kraft did to Cadburys!
attributes.background: Kraft is a huge multi-billon dollar business  that enjoys taking over other large companies just for the sake of greed. They also lie - look what they did to Cadburys. This unholy alliance would be very bad news for the consumer.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as this isn't something that the Government or Parliament could do. This would be a decision for the Competition and Markets Authority, which is independent of both the UK Government and Parliament when it makes its decisions. You can find out more about the Competition and Markets Authority here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/competition-and-markets-authority/about
